bibl.title: with the assistance of Louise SHALER, James COWEY and Oliver HOOVER, From Minoan Farmers to Roman Traders. Sidelights on the Economy of Ancient Crete
bibl.note: 90 documentary ostraca from the excavations conducted by St. Mandalaki in Chersonesos (northern coast of Crete) in September 1995. The archive (2nd century AD) seems to have contained a series of memorandum for everyday transactions. - 1. Introduction. - 2. Form and content. - 3. Names. - 4. Date and palaeography. - 5. Function. - Bibliography.
LITINAS Nikos, Ostraca Chersonesi. A Preliminary Report.

Angelos CHANIOTIS (Ed.), with the assistance of Louise SHALER, James COWEY and Oliver HOOVER, From Minoan Farmers to Roman Traders. Sidelights on the Economy of Ancient Crete = Heidelberger althistorische Beitr√§ge und epigraphische Studien. 29 (Stuttgart, 1999) pp. 349-351.
